column1: Uchi////So before I even came to visit for Christmas
column2: we mapped out when we could fit in an Uchi trip
column3: and it seemed that my last meal before heading to the airport was the best match. We attempted to make a reservation a few days in advance
column4: but there were none to be had
column5: so we just showed up at 5:10
column6: hoping to score one of the walk-in tables
column7: or a seat at the bar. Nope.
